entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
